remarks: Value of a function given by the "maps to" notation, analogous to ~ ovmpt4g .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.)
statement:
aovmpt4g.3 $e |- F = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) $.
aovmpt4g $p |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B /\ C e. V ) -> (( x F y )) = C ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d V x y $.
